mapper.select: select forecast_table.show_type show_type,forecast_table.data_type data_type,forecast_table.cz_count forecast_cz_count,forecast_table.crg_ddwght_tns forecast_crg_ddwght_tns,actual_table.cz_count actual_czCount,actual_table.crg_ddwght_tns actual_crg_ddwght_tns from tdm_this_year_each_shiplock_forecast_df forecast_table left join tdm_this_year_each_shiplock_forecast_df actual_table on forecast_table.data_type=actual_table.data_type and forecast_table.show_type=actual_table.show_type where forecast_table.snid='预测过闸' and actual_table.snid='实际过闸'
